metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0181 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
In exif_data_load_data_thumbnail of exif-data.c, there is a possible denialof service due to an integer overflow. This could lead to remote denial ofservice with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction isnot needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10Android ID:A-145075076

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-0181` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libexif12 - 0.6.21-6ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libexif package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.21-6ubuntu0.1').
